ygData.subject: Re: What class does GZ play?
ygData.msgSnippet: Glad he plays a bard, I always wanted to be the class that other classes complain about. Comments posted all over other message boards: Bards only got XXXXXX
ygData.messageBody:
Glad he plays a bard, I always wanted to be the class that other classes complain about.

Comments posted all over other message boards:
"Bards only got XXXXXX because <insert any Verant developer> plays a bard."



----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 28, 1999 9:29 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] What class does GZ play?


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> pretty cool. now he just needs to get his bard to 50 in the next week and
> see that he has 4 missing songs =)
>
> Shada
>
> >
> > From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
> >
> > GZ: I have got to say that I love my 1/2 elf Bard - but
> > mostly because when
> > I play, I am a very social player. Bards are good at being
> > social. In fact,
> > I built them to be so. This is my current one - I have played
> > a lot of EQ,
> > and tend to change my opinion every few weeks.
> >
> >
> > Elwyn Heartstring
> > Level 48 Bard
> > Erollisi Marr
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.
>
